name: Ruth & The Ruthless Pirates
description:
Ruth grew up on The Ruthless so she doesn't know any better, but her talking parrot does-- he's sick of these whiney drunkards of a crew! After ditching the boat, follow Ruth and her talking parrot on their venture out over the seas! 

CONTROLS:

Left arrow, Right arrow - Move around

[E] - Talk

[Shift] - Stop Talking

[Tab] - Pickpocket

[I] - Inventory

Later on during Ocean Scene...

Up arrow - Jump

Down arrow - Duck

Coders: Jenna Tvedt, Ava Smith, Amelie Elmquist

Artists: Magpie, Sophia Mathew, Amelie Elmquist

Writers: Matthew Ziegler, Amelie Elmquist

Voice Actors: Isabel Dulcinea, Matthew Ziegler

Musicians: Paul LePage
